name: The Frying Game
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), John Swartzwelder, Matt Warburton (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Homer and Marge find themselves on death row after they are framed for murder.
